input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Men's Polo Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort, quality, and style with our men's knit polos collection.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rhone Men's Regatta Pique Polo'
  - Name='rag & bone Men's Classic Cotton Slub Jersey Polo'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Microstripe Polo'
  - Name='Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Supima Cotton Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Swannies Men's O'Leary Bobber Print Golf Polo'
  - Name='Cutter & Buck Virtue Eco Pique Stripe Recycled Mens Polo'
  - Name='Versace Men's Greca Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Burberry Men's Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Spread Collar Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Terry Cloth Jacquard Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Merino Wool & Silk Polo Sweater'
  - Name='Johnnie O Men's Huron Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Theory Men's Bron D Cosmos Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Zella Dynamic Train Polo'
  - Name='Lacoste Men's Slim Fit Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Pima Performance Polo'
  - Name='Men's Cotton Monogram Pique Polo'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Thin Cotton Blend Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Navy Solid Short Sleeve Polo'
  - Name='Men's Slim Luxe Touch Polo'
  - Name='Men's Cotton Monogram Pique Polo'
  - Name='Pima Performance Short Sleeve Henley Casual Shirt Slim for Men by Bonobos'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim Performance Piqu√© Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Pique Polo'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Men's Regatta Pique Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's polo shirt made from pique fabric, which matches the reference's knit polos in style and construction, making it highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: rag & bone Men's Classic Cotton Slub Jersey Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's polo shirt in cotton slub jersey knit closely aligns with the reference product's knit polo category and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Microstripe Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A men's performance polo shirt, likely knit, fits closely with the reference's comfort and style goals in men's polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Polo Ralph Lauren Men's Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's polo shirt identical in category, use, and construction to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Supima Cotton Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt in high-quality cotton, performance-oriented, matches well with the reference for function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Swannies Men's O'Leary Bobber Print Golf Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's golf polo shirt, which is a subtype of men's polo shirts, still knit and similar silhouette but more niche use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Cutter & Buck Virtue Eco Pique Stripe Recycled Mens Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's pique polo shirt with eco-friendly materials, sharing the essential knit polo characteristics of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Versace Men's Greca Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt with designer branding, still fundamentally the same product silhouette and construction as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Burberry Men's Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's polo shirt from a luxury brand, same product category and design as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Performance Series Spread Collar Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A performance polo shirt variant with a spread collar, very similar knit polo style and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Terry Cloth Jacquard Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo shirt made of terry cloth jacquard, slightly different fabric texture but same product silhouette and use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Merino Wool & Silk Polo Sweater
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Polo-style sweater made from wool and silk; while a knit upper, this is a sweater rather than a polo shirt, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Johnnie O Men's Huron Polo Shirt

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Contemporary men's polo shirt matching the knit polo shirt style and function of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Athletic polo shirt designed for training, likely knit but more performance-focused than traditional knit polos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Iconic men's polo shirt matching the reference in style, fit, and construction perfectly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pima Performance Polo

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Cotton Monogram Pique Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's pique knit polo shirt with cotton fabric fits closely to the reference product category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Cotton Monogram Pique Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's pique knit polo shirt with cotton fabric fits closely to the reference product category.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's cotton blend knit polo shirt matching the reference in core features and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of cotton monogram pique polo, highly relevant knit polo shirt as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicate of cotton monogram pique polo, highly relevant knit polo shirt as the reference.
